name: Atomicrops: Feline Good
descr:
[h2]关于此内容[/h2]
							Lots to get excited about with the latest [b]Feline Good[/b] Free Content Update! Want more cats? You got it! More upgrades? Done! Even more cats? Sure why not. Increased rewards from the final boss? Sure! More cat themed stuff? Ok...[h2]This update includes...[/h2][list][li]New Achievements.
[/li][li]Added Farm timelapse to end of round screen. 
[/li][li]Added Elite enemies that appear in increasing frequency after year 3. 
[/li][li]Surplus - a short mode after defeating the final boss to flex your farming power and gain more cornucopias and increase your score. Unlocked after year 3. 
[/li][li]Cat Plushies - Collect cat plushies to gain permanent stat bonuses. 
[/li][li]New stat: “Homing Pigeon” - Chance for pigeon to return when used. 
[/li][li]New stat: “Jump Start” - Chance to gain a charge immediately after using a tractor. 
[/li][li]Added more permanent upgrades to Ants. 
[/li][li]Added animal counts to info/inventory screen.[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: Atomicrops: Feline Good
类型: 动作, 独立
开发商: Bird Bath Games
发行商: Raw Fury
系列: Atomicrops
发行日期: 2021 年 7 月 8 日
review: 全部评测: 好评 (20) - 此游戏的 20 篇用户评测中有 100% 为好评。
全部评测: 好评 (20 篇中的 100%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7+
处理器: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent
DirectX 版本: 11

声卡: Yes

操作系统 *: Windows 7+
处理器: AMD Athlon X4 605e, Intel Celeron G1610 or equivalent
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: Radeon HD 7850, GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
声卡: Yes
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
